member.name: T:Gemstone.BaselineTimeInterval
member.summary: Time intervals enumeration used by method.

member.name: F:Gemstone.BaselineTimeInterval.Second
member.summary: Baseline timestamp to the second (i.e., starting at zero milliseconds).

member.name: F:Gemstone.BaselineTimeInterval.Minute
member.summary: Baseline timestamp to the minute (i.e., starting at zero seconds and milliseconds).

member.name: F:Gemstone.BaselineTimeInterval.Hour
member.summary: Baseline timestamp to the hour (i.e., starting at zero minutes, seconds and milliseconds).

member.name: F:Gemstone.BaselineTimeInterval.Day
member.summary: Baseline timestamp to the day (i.e., starting at zero hours, minutes, seconds and milliseconds).

member.name: F:Gemstone.BaselineTimeInterval.Month
member.summary: Baseline timestamp to the month (i.e., starting at day one, zero hours, minutes, seconds and milliseconds).

member.name: F:Gemstone.BaselineTimeInterval.Year
member.summary: Baseline timestamp to the year (i.e., starting at month one, day one, zero hours, minutes, seconds and milliseconds).

startIndex is less than zero or greater than the length of value minus 1.

member.name: M:Gemstone.BitMath.GetClearedBitPositions(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the bit position for every bit that is cleared in the provided value. Bit positions are defined as 0-31;
member.param: Target value for bit check enumeration.
member.returns: Enumeration of all cleared bit positions.

member.name: M:Gemstone.BitMath.GetClearedBitPositions(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Returns the bit position for every bit that is cleared in the provided value. Bit positions are defined as 0-63;
member.param: Target value for bit check enumeration.
member.returns: Enumeration of all cleared bit positions.

member.summary: Returns the bit position for every bit that is set in the provided value. Bit positions are defined as 0-31;
member.param: Target value for bit check enumeration.
member.returns: Enumeration of all set bit positions.

member.summary: Returns the bit position for every bit that is set in the provided value. Bit positions are defined as 0-63;
member.param: Target value for bit check enumeration.
member.returns: Enumeration of all set bit positions.
